meanings.definition: To surgically remove the ovaries of (a female animal)
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian will spay the cat to prevent unwanted litters.
meanings.sent2: It is common practice to spay female dogs to control the pet population.
meanings.sent3: After the surgery to spay the dog, she felt much better.
meanings.sent4: The decision to spay the rabbit was a weight off the owner's shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The shelter offers affordable services to spay and neuter pets in the community.

meanings.definition: The act of spaying a female animal
meanings.sent1: The spay of the cat was successful and she recovered quickly.
meanings.sent2: Many animal shelters promote the spay of pets to reduce overpopulation.
meanings.sent3: The spay of the dog was a relief for the worried owner.
meanings.sent4: The spay of the rabbit was a simple procedure at the veterinary clinic.
meanings.sent5: The spay of the cat was a topic of discussion among pet owners in the neighborhood.
